identity.mission: Create a frictionless, 'Soft Utility' experience that feels professional yet distinct.
principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix utility with 'Control Room' aesthetics.
Content is King: The email content is the hero.
Negative Space: Generous padding to reduce cognitive load.
Contrast: High contrast for readability in dark mode.

heading.usage: Main titles, section headers. Use tight tracking (-0.02em).

rules: Input text should be at least 16px to prevent zooming on mobile.

layout.container: max-w-2xl mx-auto min-h-screen flex flex-col justify-center p-6 md:p-12
layout.grid_strategy: Flexbox column for mobile, simple grid for larger screens if needed (e.g., side-by-side tone selector and button).

textarea.style: min-h-[200px] resize-none bg-[#18181b]/50 backdrop-blur-sm border border-[#27272a] rounded-xl p-4 text-base focus:outline-none focus:border-[#3b82f6] transition-all duration-300
textarea.placeholder: Paste the email you received or describe the situation...

button.copy: absolute top-4 right-4 p-2 rounded-md hover:bg-[#27272a] transition-colors

card.style: relative overflow-hidden rounded-2xl border border-[#27272a] bg-[#18181b]/80 backdrop-blur-md shadow-2xl

background_texture.usage: Fixed background with low opacity (opacity-20) and mix-blend-overlay to add subtle depth to the solid dark background.

visual_enhancers.glassmorphism: Use backdrop-blur-xl for the main container or cards to separate them from the background.
visual_enhancers.glow_effects: Use subtle colored shadows (shadow-indigo-500/20) on the main action button.

motion.loading: Use a skeleton loader or a subtle pulse animation for the generated text area.

accessibility.contrast: Ensure all text meets APCA standards. Use text-zinc-400 for placeholders, text-zinc-100 for input.
accessibility.focus: Visible focus rings are mandatory for keyboard navigation.
accessibility.labels: All inputs must have visible or aria-labels.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. Install dependencies: `npm install lucide-react` (or yarn add).
3. Create the layout: Use the 'Monolith' structure.
4. Implement the 'Liquified' background image as a fixed, low-opacity layer.
5. Build the Input Section: Textarea + Tone Selector.
6. Build the Output Section: Only visible after generation (or use a placeholder state).
7. Add 'Copy to Clipboard' functionality with a toast notification (use Sonner).
8. Connect to the backend API (mock it if necessary for UI dev).
9. Apply the 'Electric Blue' accent sparingly - only for the primary action.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Do not use generic centered layouts.
Create depth through layered design elements.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
Subtle grain textures or noise overlays are encouraged.
NEVER use AI assistant Emoji characters.
